title: [Question] Anyone know the type of questions in ISA 1 (esp Physics) for SEM 1.
content: Are the PESU Academy assignment questions enough for ISA 1, especially Physics? Any PYQs available ?

comments.body: go through the textbook if possible, though pesu academy material + mcqs are usually enough for getting a 30+ score in ISA. PYQ's won't be available for ISA's; only for ESA's, PYQ's are available.
Textbook: Concepts of Modern Physics: Arthur Beiser
